xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/452784-3 Char Sau Bees 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pk2EJwlT4PYZrK3YKd9TOaUsooo.jpg Selvan (Govindankutty), Rahul and Zulfi are three engineering students who lead a double life and are involved in robbing ATMs when not in college. They trick a millionaire (Salim Kumar) into installing webcams in his house under the premise of surveillance. However they use the webcams themselves to monitor the house to plan for a robbery. When they finally reach the house to rob money, they are met with an unpleasant surprise. 3 Char Sau Bees
